contentrichtext.text: {{historical}} The '''Wikipedia Cookbook''' is now considered a [[wikibooks:Cookbook|textbook]]. The textbook project is an [[experiment]]. The [[cooking]], [[cuisine]] and [[gardening]] sections here will remain to discuss these fields generally. Some people want to move the [[list of recipes]] to the [[Wikibooks:Cookbook:Table of Contents|Wikimedia Cookbook]] at [[Wikibooks:Wikibooks|Wikibooks]], while others believe that the encyclopedia should have comprehensive coverage of cuisine, with sample recipes, while the variations are in the cookbook.
